name: Verify Fix for DEF-003: Door Closing Animation
description: Verifies that the door closing animation is not cancelled by rapid interaction.
testObjective: Confirm that the defect is fixed and the animation plays to completion.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Obtain suit and climb ladder to ship.
Interact with ship power button to restore power.
Turn around and open the hallway door using [E].
Wait for the opening animation to complete.
Immediately press [E] multiple times rapidly while the door is closing.
steps.expected: The door closing animation plays to completion regardless of additional inputs.
